name: Ancient Grudge
oracle_text:
Destroy target artifact.
Flashback {G} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)
flavor_text: If there's anything a werewolf hates, it's a collar—especially Avacyn's Collar, the symbol of her church.

name: Ancient Stirrings
oracle_text: Look at the top five cards of your library. You may reveal a colorless card from among them and put it into your hand. Then put the rest on the bottom of your library in any order.

name: Arcane Signet
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: It started as a mere drop of water. The Magic Mirror crystallized it into much more.

name: Basilisk Gate
oracle_text:
{T}: Add {C}.
{2}, {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Gates you control. Activate only as a sorcery.
flavor_text: The eastern passage into the city is filled with reminders that the patriars are literally looking down on you.

name: Basking Rootwalla
oracle_text:
{1}{G}: This creature gets +2/+2 until end of turn. Activate only once each turn.
Madness {0} (If you discard this card, discard it into exile. When you do, cast it for its madness cost or put it into your graveyard.)

name: Bojuka Bog
oracle_text:
This land enters tapped.
When this land enters, exile target player's graveyard.
{T}: Add {B}.

name: Brainstorm
oracle_text: Draw three cards, then put two cards from your hand on top of your library in any order.
flavor_text:
"I see more than others do because I know where to look."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Cabal Ritual
oracle_text:
Add {B}{B}{B}.
Threshold — Add {B}{B}{B}{B}{B} instead if seven or more cards are in your graveyard.
flavor_text: The Patriarch is long dead, but his name still stains the lips of cultists.

name: Cathar Commando
oracle_text:
Flash
{1}, Sacrifice this creature: Destroy target artifact or enchantment.
flavor_text: "Honorable tactics are for honorable foes. These werewolves are preying on innocent travelers. I'll stab them in the back while they sleep if I have to."

name: Chain Lightning
oracle_text: Chain Lightning deals 3 damage to any target. Then that player or that permanent's controller may pay {R}{R}. If the player does, they may copy this spell and may choose a new target for that copy.

name: Colossal Dreadmaw
oracle_text: Trample (This creature can deal excess combat damage to the player or planeswalker it's attacking.)
flavor_text: If you feel the ground quake, run. If you hear its bellow, flee. If you see its teeth, it's too late.

name: Command Tower
oracle_text: {T}: Add one mana of any color in your commander's color identity.
flavor_text: When defeat is near and guidance is scarce, all eyes look in one direction.

name: Consider
oracle_text:
Surveil 1. (Look at the top card of your library. You may put it into your graveyard.)
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Ivold gasped in surprise. Either a very strange insect had crawled onto one of the lenses or he was seeing geists at last!

name: Counterspell
oracle_text: Counter target spell.
flavor_text:
"Your attack has been rendered harmless. It is, however, quite pretty."
—Saprazzan vizier

name: Culling the Weak
oracle_text:
As an additional cost to cast this spell, sacrifice a creature.
Add {B}{B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"The blood of the weak shall be the ink with which we scribe great Yawgmoth's glorious name."
—Stronghold architect, journal

name: Dark Ritual
oracle_text: Add {B}{B}{B}.
flavor_text:
"Eye of twilight, give us sight.
Take our offer, give us might.
Make our power tears of night."

name: Darksteel Citadel
oracle_text:
Indestructible
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Panopticon, forge of the Darksteel Eye, home of Mirrodin's keeper.

name: Dead Ringers
oracle_text: Destroy two target nonblack creatures unless either one is a color the other isn't. They can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "Beautiful, isn't it?" crowed Crovax. "They fought together. Now they will die together."

name: Dragon's Approach
oracle_text:
Dragon's Approach deals 3 damage to each opponent. You may exile Dragon's Approach and four cards named Dragon's Approach from your graveyard. If you do, search your library for a Dragon creature card, put it onto the battlefield, then shuffle.
A deck can have any number of cards named Dragon's Approach.

name: Environmental Sciences
oracle_text: Search your library for a basic land card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle. You gain 2 life.
flavor_text: First-years quickly learn how the Vastlands earned its name.

name: Faerie Macabre
oracle_text:
Flying
Discard this card: Exile up to two target cards from graveyards.
flavor_text: The line between dream and death is gauzy and fragile. She leads those too near it from one side to the other.

name: Faithless Looting
oracle_text:
Draw two cards, then discard two cards.
Flashback {2}{R} (You may cast this card from your graveyard for its flashback cost. Then exile it.)

name: Foil
oracle_text:
You may discard an Island card and another card rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Counter target spell.
flavor_text: Among wizards, poor timing is the most consistent mistake.

name: Hoodwink
oracle_text: Return target artifact, enchantment, or land to its owner's hand.

name: Hunting Cheetah
oracle_text: Whenever this creature deals damage to an opponent, you may search your library for a Forest card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.

name: Hydroblast
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's red.
• Destroy target permanent if it's red.

name: Lotus Petal
oracle_text: {T}, Sacrifice this artifact: Add one mana of any color.
flavor_text: "Hard to imagine," mused Hanna, stroking the petal, "such a lovely flower inspiring such greed."

name: Merchant Scroll
oracle_text: Search your library for a blue instant card, reveal that card, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
flavor_text: Lat-Nam wizards trade knowledge on scrolls made of magic so they can better guard against thieves and spies.

name: Nature's Claim
oracle_text: Destroy target artifact or enchantment. Its controller gains 4 life.
flavor_text:
"On this plane, the use of magic can provoke a ferocious reprisal from nature. Whoever the Eldrazi were, their relics left Zendikar forever enraged."
—Jace Beleren

name: Nomads en-Kor
oracle_text: {0}: The next 1 damage that would be dealt to this creature this turn is dealt to target creature you control instead.
flavor_text: The Kor forsake roots for the winding of the path; forsake voices for the silence of the mind; forsake all else for the poverty of isolation.

name: Ponder
oracle_text:
Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle.
Draw a card.
flavor_text: Tomorrow belongs to those who prepare for it today.

name: Preordain
oracle_text: Scry 2, then draw a card. (To scry 2, look at the top two cards of your library, then put any number of them on the bottom and the rest on top in any order.)

name: Pyroblast
oracle_text:
Choose one —
• Counter target spell if it's blue.
• Destroy target permanent if it's blue.

name: Rat Colony
oracle_text:
This creature gets +1/+0 for each other Rat you control.
A deck can have any number of cards named Rat Colony.
flavor_text: Wreckage from the Phyrexian Invasion provided the rats with a seemingly unlimited number of breeding grounds.

name: Relic of Progenitus
oracle_text:
{T}: Target player exiles a card from their graveyard.
{1}, Exile this artifact: Exile all graveyards. Draw a card.
flavor_text: Elves believe the hydra-god Progenitus sleeps beneath Naya, feeding on forgotten magics.

name: Rite of Flame
oracle_text: Add {R}{R}, then add {R} for each card named Rite of Flame in each graveyard.
flavor_text: Deep beneath the ice, beneath the soil and the rock, Dominaria's fire still burned hot.

name: Sakura-Tribe Elder
oracle_text: Sacrifice this creature: Search your library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.
flavor_text: There were no tombstones in orochi territory. Slain warriors were buried with a tree sapling, so they would become a part of the forest after death.

name: Seeker of Skybreak
oracle_text: {T}: Untap target creature.
flavor_text:
"We shun them not for their dream but for their refusal to let such a noble dream die a noble death."
—Eladamri, Lord of Leaves

name: Simian Spirit Guide
oracle_text: Exile this card from your hand: Add {R}.
flavor_text:
"It's rarely worth questioning where the mana comes from. Just be grateful."
—Jaya Ballard, task mage

name: Snuff Out
oracle_text:
If you control a Swamp, you may pay 4 life rather than pay this spell's mana cost.
Destroy target nonblack creature. It can't be regenerated.
flavor_text: "The bigger they are, the faster they rot."

name: Spell Pierce
oracle_text: Counter target noncreature spell unless its controller pays {2}.
flavor_text:
"There's a hole in your plan."
—Noyan Dar, Tazeem lullmage

name: Street Wraith
oracle_text:
Swampwalk (This creature can't be blocked as long as defending player controls a Swamp.)
Cycling—Pay 2 life. (Pay 2 life, Discard this card: Draw a card.)
flavor_text: The lamps on Wyndmoor Street snuff themselves at midnight and refuse to relight, afraid to illuminate what lies in the darkness.

name: Thought Vessel
oracle_text:
You have no maximum hand size.
{T}: Add {C}.
flavor_text: Infinite possibilities contained in a finite space.

name: Tinder Wall
oracle_text:
Defender (This creature can't attack.)
Sacrifice this creature: Add {R}{R}.
{R}, Sacrifice this creature: It deals 2 damage to target creature it's blocking.

name: Unholy Heat
oracle_text:
Unholy Heat deals 2 damage to target creature or planeswalker.
Delirium — Unholy Heat deals 6 damage instead if there are four or more card types among cards in your graveyard.
flavor_text: "The devils use fire. Why shouldn't we?"

name: Whiteout
oracle_text:
All creatures lose flying until end of turn.
Sacrifice a snow land: Return this card from your graveyard to your hand.
